When Experience Matters

Committed to Helping Our Clients Succeed

Who We Are

The Law Office of Cynthia A. Cheatham is located in Nashville, TN and takes cases involving all family law matters, including divorce, child custody, termination of parental rights, and adoption. With a primary focus on difficult family law cases, Cynthia has a long track record of being able to turn challenging and complicated situations in complete victories for the parent.

Cynthia has represented people all across the state of Tennessee, and has collaborated on cases in other states, including Maryland, Georgia, Ohio and Connecticut. Cynthia is also a member of several law organizations, having memberships in the American Bar Association, in the Tennessee Bar Association, on the board of the Legal Aid Society for Middle Tennessee, and more. This level of experience that can only be gained from working such large amounts of diverse and complex cases, in addition to her impressive credentials, mean you can feel secure that Cynthia has the knowledge, expertise, and dedication to getting the absolute best outcome for your case.
